snippet: Mr. Steinberg was a leading figure of the deal-making era of the 1980s, mounting a well-publicized, but unsuccessful, takeover of Chemical Bank.
abstract: Saul Steinberg, corporate raider, dies at age 73.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Steinberg was a leading figure of the deal-making era of the 1980s, mounting a well-publicized, but unsuccessful, takeover of Chemical Bank.

headline.seo: Saul P. Steinberg, Bold Corporate Raider, Dies at 73
headline.main: Saul P. Steinberg, Icon of the Corporate Takeover, Dies at 73
headline.print_headline: Saul P. Steinberg, 73, Icon Of the Corporate Takeover
